EmailTemplate.name: Accelerate_Cloud_Migration.Accelerate_Cloud_Migration_Nurture_4_Case Study [ARCH
EmailTemplate.subject: Continuously Optimize your AWS Environment with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Are you concerned about managing your cloud spend in the future? You're not alone. MetroStar Systems had this concern as well. Under executive pressure to with reduce their AWS spend fast, MetroStar Systems turned to Turbonomic <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/optimize-public-cloud-spend/metrostar-case-study]]>. By automating Turbonomic AWS storage tier optimization recommendations, they quickly saw a 25% reduction in their monthly spend.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/optimize-public-cloud-spend/metrostar-case-study]]>
Interested in learning more? See how over 1,900 of our customers <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies]]> leverage workload automation to simultaneously optimize performance, cost and policy compliance in real-time. Regards, Team Turbonomic
